scripts.build-dist: bun run clean-dist && bun run build-bundle && bun run build-types
scripts.build-bundle: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --minify --splitting --external fs --external path --external crypto
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run test:unit && bun run build-dist
scripts.dev:cli: command -v bun >/dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'Error: bun is required but not installed.' && exit 1) && bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --watch
scripts.dev:link: command -v npm >/dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'Error: npm is required but not installed.' && exit 1) && npm link && echo 'âœ“ pastoralist command now available globally'
scripts.dev:unlink: command -v npm >/dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'Error: npm is required but not installed.' && exit 1) && npm unlink -g pastoralist
scripts.validate:full: bun run validate && bun run test:e2e && bun run test:bench
scripts.setup: bun install && bun run build && bun run test:unit && echo 'âœ“ Setup complete! Run bun run dev:link to use pastoralist globally'
